front.title: Mobile Multicast Control Protocol in Wireless/Mobile Networks

abstract.t: This document is a part of the ITU-T Recommendation and ISO/IEC International Standard, named the Mobile Multicast Communications Protocol (MMCP). The MMCP is a protocol that can be used to support a variety of multimedia multicasting services in the IP-based wireless mobile networks. The MMCP is targeted at the real-time one-to-many multicast services and applications over mobile communications networks.
